en.instance_create_default: Now you need to define the default instance.
en.instance_name_description: This is the name of the instance. This can be changed later.
en.instance_port_description: If you wish to change the port of the instance, you can set it here.
en.instance_port_required: Instance port is required. It must be a number between 1 and 65535.
en.instance_port_taken: This port is already taken, please choose a different port.
en.name: Name
en.password_description: Enter you desired password. Passwords must be at least 5 characters long.
en.user_add_admin_account: To start you need to setup the administrator account.
en.username_description: Define your desired username. Usernames must be at least 3 characters long.
